student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hi! How are you feeling today?
I am feeling good, thank you. How are you?
I’m great, thanks! Do you have any healthy habits you do every day?
Healthy habits are things you do regularly to keep your body and mind strong, like eating fruits, drinking water, or exercising. Do you do any of these?
Yes, I drink water every day.
That’s great! Drinking water is so important for your health. Do you also eat fruits or vegetables daily? It’s a good way to stay healthy too!
Yes, I eat fruits every day.
Good job! You have healthy habits like drinking water and eating fruits. Keep it up! Talk to you later!
